release.name: v1.0.0 - SegnoMMS Production Release
release.body:
## SegnoMMS v1.0.0 - Production Release

### New Features
- Complete cspell migration for modern spell checking
- Enhanced GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline
- Comprehensive documentation build system
- Multi-platform testing across Python 3.9-3.13
- Visual regression testing framework
- Segno compatibility testing
- Advanced QR code shape rendering

### Improvements
- Modernized spell checking with cspell
- Enhanced documentation quality gates
- Improved test coverage and reporting
- Cross-platform build validation
- Security scanning integration

### Testing
- Full test suite across multiple Python versions
- Visual regression tests for QR generation
- Documentation example validation
- README example testing
- Compatibility testing with Segno versions

### Infrastructure
- UV package manager integration
- Optimized GitHub Actions workflows
- Enhanced caching strategies
- Multi-job CI pipeline
- Quality gate enforcement

repository.name: segnomms
repository.description: Advanced QR code generation plugin for Segno with custom shapes, styling, and interactivity
